subject: Fishing, Sport
Fish and Other Marine Life
lead_paragraph: Larry Krohn, the director of the annual Minnetonka Classic Bass Tournament, says he loves handing the big checks to the people who reel in the biggest fish. The prize pool last month was more than $30,000, including the $9,400 for the top-catching two-person team.
